meta.title: Y-GAMAA Consulting, your digital partner
meta.description: Y-GAMAA Consulting is a company that offers expertise in supporting, designing and developing digital products.

services.title: What do we offer?
services.description: Quality services that make a difference

items.alt: Image of a rocket taking off
items.heading: Audit & Optimization
items.text: Audit of your architecture, optimization recommendations based on your context and implementation of modern SI and cloud-native architectures. Architecture patterns: Event-driven architecture (EDA), Microservices architecture, APIization ...), AI, Low/No Code. Advice on Green IT, Eco-design, Responsible digital technology.

items.alt: Image of a developer behind 2 screens
items.heading: Fullstack Development & DevSecOps
items.text: Custom development of your website, mobile application, API, etc. Frontend and/or backend development, recommendation and implementation of your continuous integration and deployment (CI/CD) or Infrastructure as Code (IaC) pipeline according to GitOps best practices and DORA indicators. Implementation of quality control and security best practices.

items.alt: Image of 2 people in front of a kanban board
items.heading: Tech and/or Lean & Agile Support
items.text: Audit of your team's organization, implementation of agile scrum/kanban methodology according to the context, agility at the SAFe scale. Support for startups in launching their tech team, CTO as a service.

partners.title: Our Experiences
partners.description: 20 years of experience in supporting, designing, and developing digital products. Successful missions with many renowned clients in various sectors: industry, banking/insurance, retail, ESN, etc.

slide1.title: Looking for a partner for your digital transformation?
slide1.subtitle: Our experienced team can assist you in modernizing and improving your information systems and implementing an agile culture.

slide2.title: Want to build a new digital service?
slide2.subtitle: Our team of enthusiasts can support you from the study phase to maintenance, including the development of your digital product, website, mobile application, API...

slide3.title: Need expertise for your complex IT problems?
slide3.subtitle: Our passion combined with our 20+ years of experience and solid academic background allows us to intervene in high-value-added missions and in solving complex problems.

hero.title: Who are we?
hero.description:
We are digital experts, passionate and committed to accompanying our clients in their digital transformation and working with them to create digital solutions that are both innovative, high-performing, and environmentally friendly. The main values we try to convey on the field are: simplicity, agility, innovation, continuous improvement, and teamwork. As followers of the Pareto Principle, we are convinced that targeted good actions generate the most value for our clients.

Join us in the adventure to co-build a sustainable digital future.
